Key Match Events: The match between India and Canada was abandoned without a ball being bowled due to a wet outfield.
Pre-Game Insights: There was slim hope for play, as the sun briefly emerged between spells of rain on Friday, but areas around the stadium received up to two feet of rain, leading Florida governor Ron DeSantis to declare a state of emergency.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was abandoned, and India confirmed its top spot in its group ahead of USA.
The Super Eight, the second round of the competition, will commence from June 19, with eight teams divided into two groups of four each.
Others: The India vs Canada T20 World Cup 2024 match will be telecast LIVE on the Star Sports Network in India, and streamed LIVE on the Disney+ Hotstar app and website in India.
